page.title: 20TOURISM-ROSE GREEN
page.content:
Many people spend their holidays in the area,mainly at the caravan sites where they can hire a caravan and self cater by cooking their own meals.This is popular with parents with young children.Other people bring their own caravans and stay on local farms where the farmers keep a field especially for caravans.The farms usually sell farm produce like eggs and vegetables. The main reason for people holidaying in the Bognor area is the seaside,and the proximity to large interesting cities like Brighton,Chichester, London and Portsmouth.
Prepared by Rose Green Junior School. Assisted by Rose Green Infant School.
